entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18 except minus 24 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18 except minus 24 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
